column1: Affects new orders with products set to be pre-ordered.
column2: Affects new orders with products set to be pre-ordered.

column1: Please note! Products on "Pre Order" must be set to "In Stock"
column2: Please note! Products on "Pre Order" must be set to "In Stock"

column1: Allow Pre Orders For Products With Zero Quantity
column2: Allow Pre Orders For Products With Zero Quantity

column1: If set to "No", it is possible to pre order products that have quantity set to 1 or higher only. This way you can limit number of products available for pre order.
column2: If set to "No", it is possible to pre order products that have quantity set to 1 or higher only. This way you can limit number of products available for pre order.

column1: Disable Pre Order For Items With Positive Qty
column2: Disable Pre Order For Items With Positive Qty

column1: If set to "Yes", pre orders will take effect only for products with quantity 0 or lower.
column2: If set to "Yes", pre orders will take effect only for products with quantity 0 or lower.

column1: Text to display on the button instead of 'Add To Cart'
column2: Text to display on the button instead of 'Add To Cart'

column1: You can use product attributes like {sku} or {delivery_time}
column2: You can use product attributes like {sku} or {delivery_time}

column1: Message to be displayed with order information
column2: Message to be displayed with order information

column1: Detect Complex Products Which Consist only of Pre-Order Components
column2: Detect Complex Products Which Consist only of Pre-Order Components
